Hillary Clinton: s claim of bringing peace to Northern Ireland was fact-checked and found to be Half True.
Her claim of helping negotiate open bord: checked and found to be Barely True.
Her claim of dodging sniper fire in Bosn: checked and found to be Pants on Fire wrong.
Dick Morris: a former Clinton adviser-turned-foe, stated that Clinton's foreign travel schedules proved her lack of relevant experience and that her international travels included no serious diplomacy.
